article.title: U.S. Army Procures Radar Interferometers for Apaches
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corp., Owego, New York, was awarded a $31,499,392 modification (P00012) to contract W52P1J-16-C-0007 for 43 additional modernized radar frequency interferometer systems in support of the Apache attack helicopter. Work will be performed in Owego, with an estimated completion date of March 31, 2020.Â Fiscal 2015 other funds in the amount of $31,499,392 were obligated at the time of the award. The Army Contracting Command, Rock Island Arsenal, Illinois, is the contracting activity.
